methods.name: public Builder addServiceUuid(ParcelUuid serviceUuid)
methods.comment:
* Add a service UUID to advertise data.
         *
         * @param serviceUuid A service UUID to be advertised.
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the {@code serviceUuid} is null.

methods.name: public Builder addServiceSolicitationUuid(@NonNull ParcelUuid serviceSolicitationUuid)
methods.comment:
* Add a service solicitation UUID to advertise data.
         *
         * @param serviceSolicitationUuid A service solicitation UUID to be advertised.
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the {@code serviceSolicitationUuid} is null.

methods.name: public Builder addServiceData(ParcelUuid serviceDataUuid, byte[] serviceData)
methods.comment:
* Add service data to advertise data.
         *
         * @param serviceDataUuid 16-bit UUID of the service the data is associated with
         * @param serviceData Service data
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the {@code serviceDataUuid} or {@code serviceData} is
         *     empty.

methods.name: public Builder addTransportDiscoveryData(@NonNull TransportDiscoveryData transportDiscoveryData)
methods.comment:
* Add Transport Discovery Data to advertise data.
         *
         * @param transportDiscoveryData Transport Discovery Data, consisting of one or more
         *     Transport Blocks. Transport Discovery Data AD Type Code is already included.
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the {@code transportDiscoveryData} is empty

methods.name: public Builder addManufacturerData(int manufacturerId, byte[] manufacturerSpecificData)
methods.comment:
* Add manufacturer specific data. * *

Please refer to the Bluetooth Assigned Numbers document provided by the Bluetooth SIG for a list of existing company * identifiers. * * @param manufacturerId Manufacturer ID assigned by Bluetooth SIG. * @param manufacturerSpecificData Manufacturer specific data * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the {@code manufacturerId} is negative or {@code * manufacturerSpecificData} is null.

methods.name: public Builder setIncludeTxPowerLevel(boolean includeTxPowerLevel)
methods.comment:
* Whether the transmission power level should be included in the advertise packet. Tx power
         * level field takes 3 bytes in advertise packet.

methods.name: public Builder setIncludeDeviceName(boolean includeDeviceName)
methods.comment: Set whether the device name should be included in advertise packet.

methodNames: public Builder addServiceData(ParcelUuid serviceDataUuid, byte[] serviceData)
public Builder addManufacturerData(int manufacturerId, byte[] manufacturerSpecificData)
